name: LOG the game
description: Angry timbers cut down a rare tree, one of logs rescued , and now he has to save his brothers to take revenge on the BIG BAD TIMBER . Fortunately, truck with brothers crushes half the way to the factory and brothers are waiting for Log to save them and to REVENGE!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 support Graphics: DX9(Shader Model 3.0) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Any
